allow: Bash(do gh issue close $i --repo serenorg/seren-desktop --comment "Completed in PR #63")

Bash(__NEW_LINE_887152ebc66c6e68__ gh issue create --repo serenorg/seren-desktop --title "Set up Playwright browser testing for Phase 3 components" --label "type:test,phase:3-editor,agent: codex" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Overview
Set up Playwright browser/e2e testing to verify Phase 3 Code Intelligence components work correctly.

## Tasks

### 1. Install and Configure Playwright
```bash
pnpm add -D @playwright/test
npx playwright install chromium
```

### 2. Create playwright.config.ts
Configure to:
- Run against Tauri dev server \(localhost:1420\)
- Start `pnpm tauri dev` before tests
- Use Chromium for testing

### 3. Create E2E Tests

**tests/e2e/editor.spec.ts** - Monaco Editor tests:
- [ ] Editor renders and is interactive
- [ ] File opens in editor when selected
- [ ] Content changes trigger dirty state
- [ ] Syntax highlighting works for TypeScript

**tests/e2e/file-tree.spec.ts** - File Tree tests:
- [ ] File tree displays directories
- [ ] Directories expand/collapse on click
- [ ] Files can be selected
- [ ] Selection triggers file open

**tests/e2e/tabs.spec.ts** - File Tabs tests:
- [ ] Tab appears when file opens
- [ ] Active tab is highlighted
- [ ] Dirty indicator shows for unsaved files
- [ ] Tab closes on X click

**tests/e2e/completions.spec.ts** - AI Completions tests:
- [ ] Typing triggers completion \(after debounce\)
- [ ] Completions appear in editor
- [ ] Tab accepts completion

### 4. Add npm scripts
```json
{
  "test:e2e": "playwright test",
  "test:e2e:ui": "playwright test --ui",
  "test:e2e:headed": "playwright test --headed"
}
```

## Running Tests
```bash
# Run all e2e tests \(headless\)
pnpm test:e2e

# Run with UI for debugging
pnpm test:e2e:ui

# Run headed \(visible browser\)
pnpm test:e2e:headed
```

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Playwright installed and configured
- [ ] All Phase 3 components have e2e tests
- [ ] Tests pass in CI
- [ ] Test scripts added to package.json

Taariq Lewis, SerenAI, Paloma, and Volume at https://serendb.com
EOF
\)")
